reviews.review: Jogo muito bom, para você que gosta de puzzle é claro, ele pega todos os conceitos do jogo anterior e os aprimora neste, adicionando novos desafios e mecânicas MUITO interessantes, sem falar do modo coop que é muito divertido. E o modo história, é sensacional com partes que pode te render boas risadas, plots bons e um final satisfatório se fosse para dar uma nota seria 9/10

Тут есть две сюжетные арки , и одна из них совместная с другом . После этого я понял на сколько мой друг конченый . В жизни на него так не бомбило как в совместном прохождении . А вот сольный режим , топ . Всем советую эту игру ! 
9 коробок из 10

Better than the first game in every way I can think of. Portal 2 is one of the highest rated on steam for a reason. It still has that lonely atmosphere but the changes it does make to the formula are welcome. Not to mention a co-op campaign that doesn't feel tacked on to follow the 7th generation meta at the time. Portal 2 somehow took one of the best puzzle games I've ever made and washed it in comparison to itself. Definitely worth the full price. Only con I can really say is that like with most puzzle games the replay value is low here
i dont even like puzle games but thsi got me addicted tottaly worth trying
Um verdadeiro classico da valve e um jogo muito divertido pra jogar com amigo no co-op, e bom pra ficar confuso e perdido mentalmente como no meu caso. :)
portal ac gir cık mide bulantısı karlta selmalarımı iletiyorum
So much fun to play this game with mates. Highly recommended. Lots of LOLs to be had.

Игра супер! Очень классная и интересная. По графике лучше 1 части.

12/10 would be insulted by a murderous robot again

É um jogo incrível. Pra quem amou o primeiro, é uma oportunidade de jogar mais da gameplay viciante. O jogo também adiciona elementos novos desde o início, gerando uma grande diversidade e ampliando as possibilidades de ação.

The best puzzle game sequel ever made. It is an emotional roller coaster and very funny, overall one off my favourite games. I Would Recommend trying the co-op to which i havent tried but it is supposed to be good. also check out the community for the game you might like it, it has a good few mods for the game.
ОТЛИЧНАЯ ИГРА! только тортик не дали(((
A game that strikes the absolute perfect balance between brain gymnastics and absolutely unhinged adventure comedy. A long-standing favorite.

晕晕晕晕晕
人生第一次晕3D就在传送门
但是游戏真的好，上次这么好的体验还是在传送门一
传送门二好上加好，游戏本身就已经够好了，更何况还有多人游戏、背景动画与漫画，实验室（创意工坊）
我爱传送门👍
最高すぎるその一言に尽きる
This is probably the best game that come out in 2011.

The story telling and puzzles in this game are on a whole different level, valve producing such a banger is expected but I still overwhelmingly loved this game, one of my favourite games of all time! If you somehow haven't played the portal series yet please do yourself a favour and try them out, I promise you won't regret it!
То место где я учу физику
What do you mean you've never played Portal 2? Drop what you're doing and buy this game right now! Take a day off to complete it if you have to.

one of the greatest games of all time

brilliant puzzles, amazing soundtrack, hilarious characters, and one of my favorite stories in a game
很显然，我已经通关了传送门2（主线剧情），真的，最后的反转惊艳到我了，通关了一代我就紧接着玩二代了，剧情很饱满。一直喜欢G姐，看她的感情变化还是很有趣的。最后也是到达了金黄的麦田，说实话有点想哭，特别是看到了那块爱心方块的时候......看来G姐还是把我当作好朋友的呜呜呜

目前只打完了双人的部分，解谜的设计非常精彩，隐藏关把前几关的内容都结合在一起了很有意思
[spoiler]最后一关的结尾用拥抱开门真的太浪漫了，一整个被感动到[/spoiler]，合作解谜的过程也是两个小机器人学习人类情感的过程，真的是个非常浪漫的游戏
最后感谢我的科学合作伙伴，逻辑清晰有耐心，游戏体验极佳
What can i say? It's good. Play it
good game. lots of stuff. very hard. my head hurts
